contents.Text: This is the directory songs will be downloaded into
The number of simultaneous downloads that can occur
The Deduplicate Detector employs sophisticated techniques to identify songs that sound similar or are duplicates.
While it is highly effective, there may be occasional instances where it detects songs that are not truly duplicates; however, such occurrences are quite rare.
To improve the accuracy of the detection process, it is beneficial to retain the unique ID of each song at the end of the downloaded files.
Although preserving the ID is not strictly necessary, it can contribute to enhanced matching accuracy.
By default it uses ids at the end of the song name to change this refer to [[[button:Settings][../../Settings]]]
These are the same as the fields in [[[button:Key and below in Playlist Editor][../Playlist Editor]]]
Spotfetch_download_selection: This selects what you want to download from spotify:
[[[button:Import or Export][Import_Export]]] your playlists to a json file
